title: Bug 269522[handles] Cross reference view and markers mix up joinpoints assigned to advice
description: Bug 269522[handles] Cross reference view and markers mix up joinpoints assigned to advice
OB: When selecting line 22, there are 5 joinpoints displayed, but there should only be 3. When selecting line 68, there are no joinpoints displayed, but there should be 2. Right-clicking the marker at line 68 and choosing 'advises' shows all 5 joinpoints.
EB: When selecting line 22, there are 5 joinpoints displayed, but there should only be 3. When selecting line 68, there are no joinpoints displayed, but there should be 2. Right-clicking the marker at line 68 and choosing 'advises' shows all 5 joinpoints.
